messages.message:
Hi team,
I was seeing below API response in `/fetch-entities` on this (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/prashantkikani1?cw=dev) crafting sandbox.
```Previously uploaded documents are still being processed for this conversation, please wait & try again later!```
And for `/classification` endpoint, I was seeing below API response.
```Conflict with existing project jobs```
Have you seen this error? I searched with these error in Slack, and got threads like this (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C04TSMWLPAS/p1706651181633789) one..
I tried running `api/v1/jobs/cancel_all` using Postman, but I got `405 Method Not Allowed`..

Is there any other way to fix this error?
cc: @Serena
Context: I am trying to test the backend API changes for the UDF for doc/split classification task.

how did you call `/api/v1/jobs/cancel_all`? you can look at the code (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/ec2e411/webserver/api-server/src/py/instabase/api_server_apps/handler/api/v1/jobs.py#L292) for this endpoint to make sure you're calling it correctly

@Prashant Kikani also, what do you see when you open https://https--prashantkikani1-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/api/v1/jobs/view_scheduler_state (see thread (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C04TSMWLPAS/p1706651635153099?thread_ts=1706651181.633789&cid=C04TSMWLPAS))
I see `{"status": "ERROR", "statusCode": 401, "msg": "Route requires user to have permissions to manage AI Hub"}` for the above link.

you need to log in as site admin to access these `cancel_all` and `view_scheduler_state` APIs

see https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/2881486881/Setting+up+your+Dev+Environment#Log-in-as-an-admin-(IB-Classic-Apps)
